content:
Over the past 24 hours, Russian troops fired at the territory of 11 regions of Ukraine, and more than one hundred settlements have been hostile.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

"In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, artillery, tanks, RSZV, SDR, OTRC, BCC and tactical aviation - 111 settlements and 94 infrastructure sites were attacked," the statement said.

Among the civilian population are dead and injured, the number of victims is clarified.

As reportedArmyinform,The enemy again applies managed airbots in Kherson region.

Also 15 settlements of Kharkiv region per dayhave sufferedartillery and mortar attacks. There are victims.
title: During the day the enemy attacked 111 settlements of Ukraine
description: About it reports Military Media Center. “In general, from different types of weapons —...
author: Army Inform
